content: * Between the Squall Hideout and Rockrest Flat Shrines, you can find a large cave and tunnel leading to the Mother of Stones Yaoguai Chief fight. Take a right when looking at the boss to find a cave exit onto a small raised platform, and you'll find a statue head here.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Shigandang.md', within the main section titled 'Shigandang', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Shigandang'.
The content is as follows:
* Between the Squall Hideout and Rockrest Flat Shrines, you can find a large cave and tunnel leading to the Mother of Stones Yaoguai Chief fight. Take a right when looking at the boss to find a cave exit onto a small raised platform, and you'll find a statue head here.
